price: 34.Kaadu cusa, Yallih aayootaa kee Nabii sunnak sin buxaaxil tankirriyimem, Nabii buxah maraw cagalah Yalli siinih xuwaawaah, adda yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur'na mā yut'lā fī buyūtikunna min āyāti al-lahi wal-ḥik'mati inna al-laha kāna laṭīfan khabīran
